title: Alert Ping Issue
body: I just got the mouse Razer Deathadder Chroma. Ever sense i got it when i go to ping my holding G and Drag for the ping i need. But when i click G to ping and i drag the selector doesn't go where i want it to go. For example I click G and i want to ping "On My Way" (That's on the right side of the wheel) but i sometimes shows my mouse on the left side of the wheel or on some rare occasions Up or Down. If anyone has a fix for this that would be great! This bug... glitch or what ever it called is really annoying and i want to try to fix ASAP. This is the only play it is doing it. Thank you!

replies.body:
The short of it is:  sometimes League doesn't play well with really customizable mice.

Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech guru's should be able to help you out and get this working.
